return cartItems.reduce(function(qty,item){return Number(item.qty)+qty;},0);};var getCartSub=function getCartSub(){return cartItems.reduce(function(price,item){return item.price*item.qty+price;},0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cartt",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cartt-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Carro de compras"}),cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Tu Carrito esta vacio",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Volver"})]}):cartItems.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{item:item,changeQty:changeQty,removeCart:removeCart},item.product);})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cartt-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cartt-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Subtotal (",getCartCount(),") item "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$ ",getCartSub().toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Realizar compra"})})]})]});};export default Cart;
